name: HELLO! (SmugPorky)
description:
CONTROLS
WASD + Mouse - Move/Look
Space - Jump
Click - Wave
R - Restart

HELLO! (working title) is a single player-sandbox game in which the player explores a 3D environment populated by 2D characters and waves at them! All art is being created using the Doodle Studio 95 Asset Package. There is no overall objective or fail state, I want the player to be able to hang out in this world, interact with tons different creatures, have a laugh, and find secrets!

This game is being created with Unity.
